resources.string: What legendary metal band from Finland has made masterpieces like \"One with misery\" and \"Sun won\'t shine\"?
Who did Philip Anselmo get inspiration to his nickname from while performing on Necrophagias 1999 album \"Holocauste de la morte\"?
Who is the singer of Gojira?
What of these are Dark Tranquillity albums?
You must be either chick or listen to Kanye West
